remarks: If every term in a sum is divisible by ` N ` , then so is the sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
fsumdvds.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumdvds.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) $.
fsumdvds.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. ZZ ) $.
fsumdvds.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> N || B ) $.
fsumdvds $p |- ( ph -> N || sum_ k e. A B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
